td.content: s:patient with severe epigastric pain, severe diarrhea and severe abdominal pain. he has had several such episodes over past 18 months. he is a male aged 46 ys. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month he denies ever using cigarettes o:Height 191 cm, Weight 52.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 109, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to gastroenterology.

td.content: s:46 YO m gynecologist presents with severe diarrhea for more than 4 weeks. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 52.6 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 79, SystolicBP 108, DiastolicBP 67, Respiration 15, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CBC.

s:pt presents with severe epigastric pain, severe diarrhea, Stomach. he has history of severe abdominal pain. he is a 47 yr old white male. he drinks alcohol occasionally he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 190 cm, Weight 52 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 105, DiastolicBP 64, Respiration 14, 24-hour pH monitoring (esophageal) 3.6, Heart = RRR, Normal S1/S2, no murmurs, Abdomen = mild epigastric tenderness, no rebound tenderness a:Ulcers p:administered misoprostol - 400 mg daily, performed 24-hour pH monitoring (esophageal), and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

s:m aged 47 Ys presents with Heart for 7 weeks. Alcohol 1-4 beers/month he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life o:Height 191 cm, Weight 53.7 kg, Temperature 36.9 C, Pulse 90, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 73, Respiration 16 a:Embolic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 3 (established patient) - Completed, and referred patient to cardiology.

s:pt presents with Heart. he is a white male gynecologist aged 47 ys. o:Height 190 cm, Weight 52.2 kg, Temperature 36.8 C, Pulse 89, SystolicBP 106, DiastolicBP 65, Respiration 14 a:Embolic Stroke p:performed E/M Level 2 (established patient) - Completed, and ordered Carotid endarterectomy - carotid artery.
